page.title: 05Shopping in Newent
page.content: A survey showed that there were two main groups of shoppers: {1.}Newent residents {2.}People from the outlying areas who use either bus or car, they may have come 5 miles to shop. There is a wide range of goods and services in Newent and it was felt that prices were quite competitive. A further group did their daily shopping in Newent but chose to visit Gloucester and the larger supermarkets there for the family shopping either on a Thursday or Friday evening or a Saturday morning. The reasons given were mainly convenience of parking and the wider range of goods available. Two interesting shops have recently opened, a whole food shop (people are thinking about their diet);and a tool hire shop (more leisure time and many do their own house and car repairs).
